Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Westport is a highly desirable community to live and work. Westport is strategically
located 10 miles east of Stamford with easy access to I-95, the Merritt Parkway and Route 7.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
RENOVATIONS COMPLETED!
New Window Line • New Facade • New Highly Efficient HVAC Units
Solar Panels on Rooftop to Supplement Power Consumption •
New Lobbies and Restrooms • New Landscaping and Sidewalks

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: A Complete Renovation Inside and Out

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Easy access to I-95 and the Merritt Parkway

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 33 Riverside Ave is an ideal location for our business-on the water and walking distance to downtown Westport.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Recent renovations to the building facade and hardscape as well as new high-end finishes in the entrance lobby and common areas make 33 Riverside one of Westport’s most sought-after buildings. With easy access to I-95 and the Merritt Parkway 33 Riverside is prime for business. 33 Riverside Avenue offers expansive views of the Saugatuck River and
scenic downtown Westport. Diverse retail and cultural attractions are
just a short walk away.

Architecturally distinct with its brick and slab construction, elegant new lobby, and glass atrium, 55 Post Road West enjoys river views and easy access to Westport’s vibrant shopping district. Recent renovations and expansions include the lobby, bathrooms, hardscape, landscape, covered and surface parking, and elevator. Flexible floor plates, possibilities for highly visible signage, immediate access to Riverside Avenue, and close proximity to I-95 and the Merritt Parkway make this family-owned office space a remarkable opportunity just steps from everything downtown Westport has to offer.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Distinctive Renovated Building in Vibrant Westport

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Located on Route 33 with views of the Saugatuck River. Fully built out space with private offices. Excellent location with easy access to I-95, Merritt Parkway, and the Westport Train Station

• High-end finishes throughout
• Exposed ceilings, and glass walled offices
• Private restroom
• Pantry with upgraded flooring

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Minutes to Saugatuck and Main Street restaurants/shopping

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: BUILDING FEATURES: LEED-EB GOLD Certified, One mile from Westport train station, Parking 2.9/1,000 - 90% covered, Saugatuck River views on 3 sides of the building, Golf course views on the rear (western side) of the building, Convenient to I-95 and Merritt Parkway
